work.summary: Build RESTful web services to support mobile applications for Android and IOS. Help in improving development standards for web applications. Develop mobile first web applications with the use of latest design frameworks. Lead in developing new modules and customization for ecommerce portal using prestashop as a tool.

projects.name: PowerTeam
projects.description: A website for directors of different games to manage their coaches, players, events and venues.

projects.name: Chatbot API
projects.description: An API which serves as a bridge between an e-commerce website and a chatbot.

projects.name: Happyshopmate RESTAPI and Portal
projects.description: A backend API that supports the android and iOS application reward system app. This application has bunch of features which includes Coupons, NFC, Qrcode and Beacon detection which allow users to redeem and win instant prizes.

work.summary: Developed Japanese sites using PHP and XML Database with Customized Framework based on clientâ€™s requirements. Created and extended Magento modules. Converted PSD designs into web page using HTML, CSS, SCSS, Javascript and jQuery. Made sure that the web pages are cross-compatible with different browsers. Made sure that smartphone site is compatible with different devices. Documented coding standards and best practices in converting designs to pages without ruining the back-end functions.

projects.name: Iiyado (Hotel Reservation Site) and other Projects
projects.description: For front-end, it is reactive (different view files used for PC and for smartphone). As for the backend, it is developed using C# customized framework. This project has different phases.

projects.name: EasyEntry
projects.description: It is a Japanese movie reservation site developed by using a PHP Customized Framework and XML Database
